description:
The tool performs a DICOM quality check in terms of correct number of files per sequence, corrupted files, precise directory hierarchy, separated dynamic series merging them, interest series filtering/selection by specific series description lists and diffusion sequence identification by b-values. It applies the desired changes to the dataset and generates a report containing information about the selected sequences, corrupted files, missing files and merged files.

Status : Containerized

name: DICOM File Integrity Checker (EUCAIM-SW-002_T-01-01-002)
